name: Full-Stack Application with Tabbed Mode add-on (Java)
description:
Jmix web application in Java. Application views are opened in tabs inside the main view.

Contains User Interface, Security, File Storage subsystems, Data Tools and the Tabbed Application Mode add-ons.
Uses embedded HSQL database.

You can change the database and include add-ons from the Marketplace at any time when working with the project.

CAUTION: Use this template only if you have the Enterprise subscription. If you donâ€™t have the subscription, see the documentation for how to get a trial version of the Tabbed Application Mode add-on.
